div.p: The following are example usage scenarios for the DAF Patient profile

ul.li: Query for a Patient demographic information using identifiers such as MRN
Query for a Patient demographic information using first name, last name etc.
Query for Patients based on race, ethnicity, gender
Query for Patients based on geographical area such as city, state, zipcode information
Query for Patients based on age

div.p: Implementers need to be mindful of the following during their implementation

ul.li: Patient Matching rules and criteria have to be evaluated by the implementing organization and have to comply with local policies and regulations. Query Requestors will have to deal with result sets that can return zero,one or more Patient Resources in response to a query.
